amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 453 to prohibit funds to make Presidential declarations by public proclamation of a national monument under chapter 3203 of title 54, United States Code.
amendment.purpose: Amendment numbered 41 printed in House Report 114-683 to strike section 453.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A033) Failed by recorded vote: 202 - 225 (Roll no. 437).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A033) Failed by recorded vote: 202 - 225 (Roll no. 437).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A033) offered by Mr. Grijalva.
